attributes.action: do something about the dida marks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unfair Grading System In Our Schools
The IT dida project is broken into four areas (Using IT, Multimedia, Graphics and  ICT in Enterprise) and everyone who have got they're results back for the first project are disappointed as many people have failed in this course all because the system marks the GCSE work in groups. Even though all the work is done individually and many people of Wrockwardine wood arts college should of got A's and A*'s. But this is not the end of it as this has happened to at least 35 different schools around the country and the number is still rising as we speak. And this should be stopped now before more people are down graded. And they say that this will only happen this time, but what’s to say they won't do this again.
